member.name: T:Winnovative.WnvHtmlConvert.PdfFooterOptions

member.summary: Set this property with a HtmlToPdfElement object to render HTML code or URL in footer.

member.summary: Set this property with a TextArea object to render a text in header.

member.summary: Set this property with an ImageArea object to render an image in header.

member.name: P:Winnovative.WnvHtmlConvert.PdfFooterOptions.FooterBackColor
member.summary: The background color of the footer

member.name: P:Winnovative.WnvHtmlConvert.PdfFooterOptions.FooterImage
member.summary: The image to be displayed in the footer. The image will be displayed at full size

member.summary: The location in points inside the footer where to display the image. By default it is displayed in the top left corner of the header.

member.summary: The height in points of PDF footer

member.summary: The text to appear in the rendered PDF document footer

member.summary: The Y location in points of the footer text

member.summary: The footer text width in points. Default is -1 which means page width

member.summary: The color of the text displayed in the footer

member.summary: The font type of the text displayed in the footer

member.summary: The font size in points of the text displayed in the header

member.summary: When true, the page numbers. The default value is true.

member.summary: When true, a line is displayed above the footer area. The default value is true.

member.summary: The text to be displayed before the page number. The default value is 'Page'

member.summary: The font type of the text displayed in the footer page number text

member.summary: The font size in points of the text displayed in the footer page number text

member.summary: The color of the text displayed in the footer page number text

member.summary: The Y location in points of the page numbering

member.summary: Show or not the header on odd pages. By default the header is displayed both on odd and even pages.

member.name: P:Winnovative.WnvHtmlConvert.PdfFooterOptions.ShowOnEvenPages
member.summary: Show or not the header on even pages. By default the header is displayed both on odd and even pages.

member.name: P:Winnovative.WnvHtmlConvert.PdfFooterOptions.ShowOnFirstPage
member.summary: Show or not the header on first page. If true, the header will be printed on first page if showing the header on odd pages is also true.

member.summary: This property controls the whether the header appears or not in the rendered PDF document. The header properties can be further customized by setting the properties of the PDFHeaderOptions object exposed by the PDFHeaderOptions property of the PDFConverter class.

member.name: P:Winnovative.WnvHtmlConvert.PdfDocumentOptions.EmbedFonts
member.summary: When true this options instructs the converter to embed all the true type fonts into the PDF document. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Winnovative.WnvHtmlConvert.PdfDocumentOptions.LiveUrlsEnabled

member.name: P:Winnovative.WnvHtmlConvert.PdfDocumentOptions.ShowFooter

member.name: M:Winnovative.WnvHtmlConvert.HtmlToPdfArea.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create a HTML string to PDF converter element at the specified x and y coordinates with the specified width. The HTML string to convert is given by the htmlStringToConvert parameter. The virtual browser width and height in pixels are specified by the htmlViewerWidth and htmlViewerHeight paramenters.
member.param: The HTML string convert to PDF.

The full URL of the page from where this string was taken used to resolve the images and CSS files referenced by a relative URL in the HTML string. This parameter is optional and the default value is NULL. When this parameter is NULL no base URL will be used. This paramter has effect only if the specified HTML string contains a HEAD element because a will be inserted automatically by the converter.

member.name: M:Winnovative.WnvHtmlConvert.HtmlToPdfArea.#ctor(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a HTML string to PDF converter element at the specified x and y coordinates with the specified width. The HTML string to convert is given by the htmlStringToConvert parameter. The virtual browser width and height in pixels are specified by the htmlViewerWidth and htmlViewerHeight paramenters.
member.param: The x position in points where the rendered content will be placed
The y position in points where the rendered content will be placed
The destination width in points for the rendered content. If the specified with is less or equal 0, the destination width will be given by the available width in page
The HTML string convert to PDF.

The full URL of the page from where this string was taken used to resolve the images and CSS files referenced by a relative URL in the HTML string. This parameter is optional and the default value is NULL. When this parameter is NULL no base URL will be used. This paramter has effect only if the specified HTML string contains a HEAD element because a will be inserted automatically by the converter.

The virtual browser width in pixels. The default value is 1024 pixels. The effect of this parameter is similar with viewing the HTML page in a browser window with the specified width. When this parameter is less or equal 0, the converter will try to auto-determine the HTML page width from the body element width.

member.name: P:Winnovative.WnvHtmlConvert.HtmlToPdfArea.AdjustBorderSize
member.summary: There are situations when a fraction of the right and bottom borders of an image or table cell are overwritten by the image content or table cell background when the PDF document is viewed with Adobe Reader. The AdjustBorderSize value is subtracted from the background width and height. The default value is 0 points.

member.summary: Modify background transparency. 0 means transparent, 100 means opaque.

member.summary: Modify images transparency. 0 means transparent, 100 means opaque.

member.summary: The text font

member.name: P:Winnovative.WnvHtmlConvert.TextArea.EmbedTextFont
member.summary: A flag indicating if the text area font will be embedded in the PDF document

member.name: P:Winnovative.WnvHtmlConvert.TextArea.Transparency
member.summary: Gets or sets element transparency. The transparency is expressed as a value between 0 and 100. 0 means completely transparent and 100 completely opaque.

member.name: T:Winnovative.WnvHtmlConvert.PdfBookmarkOptions
member.summary: Controls the bookmark generation

member.name: P:Winnovative.WnvHtmlConvert.PdfBookmarkOptions.TagNames
member.summary: Gets or sets the names of the HTML tags to be bookmarked, e.g. "H1". If null or empty no bookmark will be generated for the PDF document.

member.name: P:Winnovative.WnvHtmlConvert.PdfBookmarkOptions.ClassNameFilter
member.summary: An additional filter to be applied to the tag name filter. This must be identical with the string set for the 'class' atttribute of the HTML tag.

member.name: P:Winnovative.WnvHtmlConvert.PdfBookmarkOptions.AllowDefaultTitle
member.summary: By default the converter will not generate bookmarks for the tags that don't have a text (e.g IMG tag). Setting this property true will instruct the converter to use the DefaultTitle or the tag outer HTML as bookmark title. The default value is false and therefore the converter will ignore the bookmarks for which a title cannot be automatically determined.

member.name: P:Winnovative.WnvHtmlConvert.PdfBookmarkOptions.DefaultTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets the default title to be used for bookmarks that don't have an associated text. This property has effect only if AllowDefaultTitle is true and DefaultTitleToOuterHtml is false. This property defaults to "Bookmark" text.

member.name: P:Winnovative.WnvHtmlConvert.PdfBookmarkOptions.DefaultTitleToOuterHtml
member.summary: When is true this property instructs the converter to use the tag outer HTML code as title when a correct title cannot be automatically determined for the bookmark. This property has effect only when the AllowDefaultTitle property is true and it has priority over the DefaultTitle property. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Winnovative.WnvHtmlConvert.PdfBookmarkOptions.BookmarkHiddenElements
member.summary: When this property is true the converter will generate bookmarks for hidden HTML elements. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Winnovative.WnvHtmlConvert.PdfBookmarkOptions.MaxTitleLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum accepted length of the bookmark title string. If a positive value is set for this property the bookmark title will be truncated if necessasry. The default value is -1 and the bookmark title will not be truncated.
